Text: dosnt work with me im on sgk 4.41 please any help

i run react psn and it dosnt work please help
explan the way to make it work please

You need the .rap-file for this game. I used PSNstuff (a windows program) to download the file. You copy the .rap-file on a USB stick. Connect the USB on the right USB port of your PS3. Use reActPSN and after the automatic restart the game works.
